name: He Who Watches - Playtest Demo
description:
He Who Watches is a spatial dungeon puzzler, where you must crawl on every surface and discover secrets to find your way out. It is a continuation of the winning entry for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022, "Labyrinth".

Currently in development, this is just a small demo to showcase progress and gather some feedback. Everything is very much a work in progress, so any feedback is greatly appreciated!
